Posts.Content: Jan 21, 2015 01:12PM Molly12 wrote: So sorry to hear about you testing positive. I will pray for you. The wait is the hard part. I was supposed to get my biopsy last Friday because they found a hot spot on the BSGI. Now I have a MRI scheduled for next Tues and the Biopsy next Friday. I hate the wait. I have a great Dr. so that helps but it's the wait that's hard. They said they could not confirm if I had 2 spots of concern or it was the same spot they were seeing twice. I hope you are doing well. Molly12
Posts.Title: Mammo with pleomorphic calcifications BI-RADS 4C - Worried! Mardea15 mia4
